input_text.Prompt:
Given a product title and product specifications, this program will generate exciting product descriptions.

Product title:
Outside Window Thermometer Right or Left Mount - Electric Blue Anodized Aluminum

Product specifications:
Anodized Aluminum
Right or Left Window Frame Mount
Rotate up to 90 for Easy Viewing
Temperature Range: -30F to 120F
Dimensions: 7.5 x 2.75 x 1 in. (19 x 7 x 2.5 cm)

Product description:
input_text.Response A: Monitoring outdoor temperatures has never been easier or more stylish with this electric blue anodized aluminum window thermometer. The thermometer can be mounted on either the left or right side of the window frame and rotates up to 90 degrees for easy viewing from inside your home or office. The temperature range is -30F to 120F, so it's suitable for use in most climates. This thermometer is made of durable anodized aluminum and measures 7.5 x 2.75 x 1 inches.
input_text.Response B: This Outside Window Thermometer is made of Anodized Aluminum and has a temperature range of -30F to 120F. It is a right or left mount and can be rotated up to 90 degrees for easy viewing. It is 7.5 x 2.75 x 1 in. (19 x 7 x 2.5 cm).

input_meta.preamble_b: Respond using only short words and simple language, as if you were talking to a child.

label_annotations.factors_a: Gives all information in an attractive manner
label_annotations.factors_b: Gives necessary information but is less interesting and more factual
